name: blockify v3.6.3
body: v3.6.3 (2016-05-20): Fix issue #105 by adding new general option "use_window_title".

name: blockify v3.6.2
body:
- fix #97: false positive ad detection on pause for people not using pulseaudio sinks  
- fix issue where pulse sink would sometimes not be unmuted on exit
- fix some minor pypi installation issues
- reimplemented dbusclient.py CLI
- add README.rst
- remove requirements.txt

name: blockify v3.6.1
body:
v3.6.1 (2016-04-11):
- Fix Gst initialization in interlude player
- Refactor dbusclient CLI
- Improve documentation

name: blockify v3.6.0
body:
v3.6.0 (2016-04-10)
- Published blockify to PyPI and PyPI-Test
- Made blockify virtualenv compatible (though it still requires --system-site-packages for gi.repository)
- Refactored the import structure

name: blockify v3.5.0
body:
2016-04-08:
- Reintroduce wmctrl to catch video ads (#89)
- More robust ad detection by relying on more information sources 
- Fix encoding issues (#95)
- Add desktop icon for blockify

name: blockify v3.4.0
body:
- Fix play/pause toggle button
- Add detach_spotify option to detach spotify from blockify when started automatically
- Change option defaults to automatically start Spotify and Spotify playback to fix #92.
- Fix play/pause toggle button, right click on tray for issue #83.
- Add start_minimized option for issue #93.

name: blockify v3.3.1
body: Fix playlist/interlude crash due to encoding error (#84).

name: blockify v3.3.0
body:
Bugfix and performance release:
- Drastically reduce cpu usage of GUI (by 50-75%)
- Add tray icon tooltip
- Fix playpause/next/prev button functionality
- Fix title information display
- Add missing screenshot of GUI to readme and update documentation
- Refactorings & small fixes

name: blockify v3.2.1
body: Minor cleanups and refactoring, e.g. removing unnecessary imports.

name: blockify v3.2.0
body:
Reintroduce playback status (#68)

This should fix
- some issues with the interlude player
- broken status display in the gui

name: blockify v3.1.0
body: Remove wmctrl dependency (#67).

name: blockify v3.0.2
body: Big fix release: issues #61 and #62

name: blockify v3.0.1
body:
Update project structure (remove implicit relative imports and blockify- prefixes from filenames).
Add **main** module to allow individual execution of blockify modules via `python -m blockify.foo`.
Fix setup routine to reflect new project structure.

name: blockify v3.0.0
body: With v3.0.0 blockify was ported from python 2 to python 3 as well as gstreamer 0.10 to gstreamer 1.0 by @RyuzakiKK (issue #59).

name: blockify v2.0.1-beta
body: Fix issues #38 and #58 as well as some other minor improvements.

name: blockify v2.0.0-beta
body:
Updated blockify to support Spotify >= v1.0.13.

This is beta software! Some functionality might be impaired or broken.
If you need stable software use the latest stable version of Blockify with the current official Spotify release (v0.9.17.8 at the time of writing).

name: blockify v1.9.0
body:
- Fix issue #52 (added localization for pulseaudio to properly initialize sink muted state).
- Add autoplay option to blockify.ini. When set to true, blockify will automatically try to resume spotify playback on startup.
- Remove fixed 10 second delay after starting Spotify from Blockify and replaced with dynamic 1-20 sec delay.

name: blockify v1.8.8
body:
Bug fix release, fixing #46 and #47.
- #47: The configuration option "pacmd_muted_value" is no longer necessary eliminating the need to adjust that value if your operating system is non-english.
- #46: The autoresume option should no longer be automatically deactivated when blockify starts.

name: blockify v1.8.7
body: Pressing play will now properly pause interlude music before resuming spotify playback.

name: blockify v1.8.6
body: Minor refactoring and removed incomplete "fix" for issue #44.

name: blockify v1.8.5
body: Signal cleanups and issue #44 again.

name: blockify v1.8.4
body:
Added signals to control spotify and the interlude player.
See the Controls/Actions section in https://github.com/mikar/blockify/blob/master/README.md for a complete list of available signals.

name: blockify v1.8.3
body:
Fix for #44
Next button now cancels interlude music and resumes spotify playback if no ad is currently playing

name: blockify v1.8.2
body:
- Reintroduced pacmd_muted_value option in general section (issue #38)
- Added `gobject.threads_init()` (issue #42)

name: blockify v1.8.1
body: - Added start_shuffled option in the interlude section of blockify.ini. Set to true to shuffle the interlude playlist at startup.

name: blockify v1.8.0
body:
Bugfix release.
- Added substring_search option (issue #36)
- Added pacmd_muted_value option (issue #38)
- Removed gtk.threads_init() (issue #39)

name: blockify v1.7.2
body:
- Added separate unmute_delay option for the GUI in the [gui] section
- Removed force unmute when Spotify is not playing a song or blockify can't find an ad. Might be reversed in the future. See #33 
- Minor logging changes

name: blockify v1.7.1
body:
Bug fix release, mostly for issue #32 
- Introduced playback_delay option (fix for #32)
- Better ConfigParser error catching
- Fixed excessive logging for update_slider failures
- Changed default filter for FileChooser from Playlists to Playable Files
- Some cleanup & documentation

name: blockify v1.7
body:
Mostly small improvements, bug fixes, refactorings and error catching:
- Fixed a segmentation fault in the CLI version.
- Added more logging statements and documentation.
- Added unmute delay option to avoid that pesky last half second you hear on some commercials.
- Switched to a homogenous thread system (no more time.sleep, no more threading.Thread, just proper gtk)

New/Important:
- Implemented a radio_timeout option (see [example_blockify.ini](https://github.com/mikar/blockify/blob/v1.7/blockify/data/example_blockify.ini) for details)
- Configuration syntax changed compared to v1.6 (see the [v1.6 example_blockify.ini](https://github.com/mikar/blockify/blob/v1.6/blockify/data/example_blockify.ini))

name: blockify v1.6
body:
Implemented configuration file system and playlist filechooser.
Several other small improvements and bug fixes (notepad, playlist parsing et al).

name: blockify v1.5
body:
Extended the interlude music system by adding:
- gui controls (play/pause, prev, next)
- autoresume option (if unchecked, it will finish the current interlude song instead of instantly switching back to spotify)
- threading

name: blockify v1.4
body: Rudimentary interlude music

name: blockify v1.3
body: GUI-Update (Buttons, Icons, Systray) and Refactoring

name: blockify v1.2
body: Cover-Art and config/cache folder in ~/.config/blockify

name: blockify v1.1
body: Autodetection of commercials

name: blockify v1.0
body:
first moderately stable release of the GUI
also:
- introduced a lot of error catching
- increased responsiveness

name: blockify v0.9
body:
When using PulseAudio, blockify will now try to only mute the Spotify sink (credit goes to kebertx).

The PyGTK ui should be mostly stable, now with the option to modify the blocklist, toggling of manual/automatic mute and block state et cetera. See screenshot in README.md.
